speaker: narrator
dialog: On your back from the cafeteria you are rushing through the hallway when someone taps your shoulder.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Turning around you are face to face with Prince Thane who is holding one of your books.

speaker: thane
dialog: Excuse me but you seemed to have dropped this.

speaker: thane
dialog: You would have realized by yourself. You did not need my help.

speaker: thane
dialog: It is no issue. We all have our moments.

speaker: thane
dialog: It's not? I must have been mistaken then.

speaker: thane
dialog: I apologize for taking your time. Excuse me.

speaker: narrator
dialog: And with that Thane makes his exit and you hurry onto your next class.
